title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
description: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' function does not work consistently. After closing all editors, creating a new file f1.txt, and selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
OB: After selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens and the open editors remain unchanged.
EB: After selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all open editors should be closed, including the newly created file f1.txt.
SR:
1. Open build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Close all open editors.
3. Create a new file f1.txt.
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
